subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|いのり|yomi=k}}
Nominalization of the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{m|ja|祈る|tr=inoru||to [[pray]], to [[hope]] for}}.
